name: The Curse of Solancis (UnderUrBedz)
description:
This is our GameJam for Group 2.

The Curse of Solancis is an adventure fantasy game, switching from top down gameplay transitioning to a 2D turn base battle. This game will take you on a spooky adventure, battling enemies as you make your way deeper into the cursed Kingdom of Solancis. Your main objective is to lift the curse in order to save your poor old mother who has been cursed. Will you be the hero this town has been waiting for all these years?
